command.text: select "MoneyReceipts"."MoneyReceiptsID" "MoneyReceiptsID" ,"MoneyReceipts"."MRDate" "MRDate" ,"MoneyReceipts"."MRNo" "MRNo" ,"MoneyReceipts"."PlotSaleID" "PlotSaleID" ,"MoneyReceipts"."PayCatID" "PayCatID" ,"PayCat"."Category" "PayCatCategory" ,"MoneyReceipts"."PCode" "PCode" ,"MoneyReceipts"."ReceAmount" "ReceAmount" ,"MoneyReceipts"."ModeofReceiptID" "ModeofReceiptID" ,"ModeofReceipt"."Description" "ModeofReceiptDescription" ,"MoneyReceipts"."ApplicantId" "ApplicantId" ,"MoneyReceipts"."AccSubNameID" "AccSubNameID" ,"AccSubName"."AccSubName" "AccSubNameAccSubName" ,"AccSubNameAccSubType"."AccSubType" "AccSubNameAccSubTypeAccSubType" ,"MoneyReceipts"."Fileno" "Fileno" ,"MoneyReceipts"."Checkno" "Checkno" ,"MoneyReceipts"."CheckDate" "CheckDate" ,"MoneyReceipts"."CheckPostDate" "CheckPostDate" ,"MoneyReceipts"."CheckBankName" "CheckBankName" ,"MoneyReceipts"."BankBranch" "BankBranch" ,"MoneyReceipts"."Dlt" "Dlt" ,"MoneyReceipts"."Description" "Description" ,"MoneyReceipts"."MultiPayment" "MultiPayment" ,"MoneyReceipts"."CancelMR" "CancelMR" ,"MoneyReceipts"."CancelDate" "CancelDate" ,"MoneyReceipts"."ReceiptType" "ReceiptType" ,"MoneyReceipts"."GName" "GName" ,"MoneyReceipts"."GFathersName" "GFathersName" ,"MoneyReceipts"."Gaddress" "Gaddress" ,"MoneyReceipts"."vide" "vide" ,"MoneyReceipts"."Created_BY" "Created_BY" ,"MoneyReceipts"."Created_DT" "Created_DT" ,"MoneyReceipts"."Updated_BY" "Updated_BY" ,"MoneyReceipts"."Updated_DT" "Updated_DT" ,"MoneyReceipts"."Remarks" "Remarks" ,"MoneyReceipts"."DisplayAction" "DisplayAction" ,"MoneyReceipts"."AccFundID" "AccFundID" ,"MoneyReceipts"."CoaDetailID" "CoaDetailID" ,"CoaDetail"."AccName" "CoaDetailAccName" ,"CoaDetailAccBalType"."AccBalType" "CoaDetailAccBalTypeAccBalType" ,"CoaDetailAccCurrency"."AccCurrencyName" "CoaDetailAccCurrencyAccCurrencyName" ,"CoaDetailAccDest"."AccDest" "CoaDetailAccDestAccDest" ,"CoaDetailAccDestCompanyType"."Description" "CoaDetailAccDestCompanyTypeDescription" ,"CoaDetailAccFund"."AccFundCode" "CoaDetailAccFundAccFundCode" ,"CoaDetailAccSubType"."AccSubType" "CoaDetailAccSubTypeAccSubType" ,"CoaDetailAccType"."AccType" "CoaDetailAccTypeAccType" ,"CoaDetailCoaControl"."AccName" "CoaDetailCoaControlAccName" ,"CoaDetailCoaControlAccBalType"."AccBalType" "CoaDetailCoaControlAccBalTypeAccBalType" ,"CoaDetailCoaControlAccDest"."AccDest" "CoaDetailCoaControlAccDestAccDest" ,"CoaDetailCoaControlAccType"."AccType" "CoaDetailCoaControlAccTypeAccType" ,"CoaDetailCoaControlCompType"."Description" "CoaDetailCoaControlCompTypeDescription" ,"CoaDetailCoaMain"."AccName" "CoaDetailCoaMainAccName" ,"CoaDetailCoaMainAccBalType"."AccBalType" "CoaDetailCoaMainAccBalTypeAccBalType" ,"CoaDetailCoaMainAccDest"."AccDest" "CoaDetailCoaMainAccDestAccDest" ,"CoaDetailCoaMainAccFund"."AccFundCode" "CoaDetailCoaMainAccFundAccFundCode" ,"CoaDetailCoaMainAccType"."AccType" "CoaDetailCoaMainAccTypeAccType" ,"CoaDetailCoaMainCoaControl"."AccName" "CoaDetailCoaMainCoaControlAccName" ,"CoaDetailCoaSub"."AccName" "CoaDetailCoaSubAccName" ,"CoaDetailCoaSubAccBalType"."AccBalType" "CoaDetailCoaSubAccBalTypeAccBalType" ,"CoaDetailCoaSubAccDest"."AccDest" "CoaDetailCoaSubAccDestAccDest" ,"CoaDetailCoaSubAccFund"."AccFundCode" "CoaDetailCoaSubAccFundAccFundCode" ,"CoaDetailCoaSubAccType"."AccType" "CoaDetailCoaSubAccTypeAccType" ,"CoaDetailCoaSubCoaControl"."AccName" "CoaDetailCoaSubCoaControlAccName" ,"CoaDetailCoaSubCoaMain"."AccName" "CoaDetailCoaSubCoaMainAccName" ,"MoneyReceipts"."AccTranID" "AccTranID" from "dbo"."MoneyReceipts" "MoneyReceipts" left join "dbo"."Paycategory" "PayCat" on "MoneyReceipts"."PayCatID" = "PayCat"."PayCatID" left join "dbo"."ModeofReceipts" "ModeofReceipt" on "MoneyReceipts"."ModeofReceiptID" = "ModeofReceipt"."ModeofReceiptID" left join "dbo"."AccSubNames" "AccSubName" on "MoneyReceipts"."AccSubNameID" = "AccSubName"."AccSubCode" left join "dbo"."AccSubTypes" "AccSubNameAccSubType" on "AccSubName"."AccSubTypeID" = "AccSubNameAccSubType"."AccSubTypeID" left join "dbo"."CoaDetail" "CoaDetail" on "MoneyReceipts"."CoaDetailID" = "CoaDetail"."CoaDetailID" left join "dbo"."AccBalTypes" "CoaDetailAccBalType" on "CoaDetail"."AccBalTypeID" = "CoaDetailAccBalType"."AccBalTypeID" left join "dbo"."AccCurrencys" "CoaDetailAccCurrency" on "CoaDetail"."AccCurrency" = "CoaDetailAccCurrency"."AccCurrencyID" left join "dbo"."AccDests" "CoaDetailAccDest" on "CoaDetail"."AccDestID" = "CoaDetailAccDest"."AccDestID" left join "dbo"."CompanyTypes" "CoaDetailAccDestCompanyType" on "CoaDetailAccDest"."CompanyType" = "CoaDetailAccDestCompanyType"."CompTypeID" left join "dbo"."AccFunds" "CoaDetailAccFund" on "CoaDetail"."AccFundID" = "CoaDetailAccFund"."AccFundID" left join "dbo"."AccSubTypes" "CoaDetailAccSubType" on "CoaDetail"."AccSubTypeID" = "CoaDetailAccSubType"."AccSubTypeID" left join "dbo"."AccTypes" "CoaDetailAccType" on "CoaDetail"."AccTypeID" = "CoaDetailAccType"."AccTypeID" left join "dbo"."CoaControl" "CoaDetailCoaControl" on "CoaDetail"."CoaControlID" = "CoaDetailCoaControl"."CoaControlID" left join "dbo"."AccBalTypes" "CoaDetailCoaControlAccBalType" on "CoaDetailCoaControl"."AccBalTypeID" = "CoaDetailCoaControlAccBalType"."AccBalTypeID" left join "dbo"."AccDests" "CoaDetailCoaControlAccDest" on "CoaDetailCoaControl"."AccDestID" = "CoaDetailCoaControlAccDest"."AccDestID" left join "dbo"."AccTypes" "CoaDetailCoaControlAccType" on "CoaDetailCoaControl"."AccTypeID" = "CoaDetailCoaControlAccType"."AccTypeID" left join "dbo"."CompanyTypes" "CoaDetailCoaControlCompType" on "CoaDetailCoaControl"."CompType" = "CoaDetailCoaControlCompType"."CompTypeID" left join "dbo"."CoaMain" "CoaDetailCoaMain" on "CoaDetail"."CoaMainID" = "CoaDetailCoaMain"."CoaMainID" left join "dbo"."AccBalTypes" "CoaDetailCoaMainAccBalType" on "CoaDetailCoaMain"."AccBalTypeID" = "CoaDetailCoaMainAccBalType"."AccBalTypeID" left join "dbo"."AccDests" "CoaDetailCoaMainAccDest" on "CoaDetailCoaMain"."AccDestID" = "CoaDetailCoaMainAccDest"."AccDestID" left join "dbo"."AccFunds" "CoaDetailCoaMainAccFund" on "CoaDetailCoaMain"."AccFundID" = "CoaDetailCoaMainAccFund"."AccFundID" left join "dbo"."AccTypes" "CoaDetailCoaMainAccType" on "CoaDetailCoaMain"."AccTypeID" = "CoaDetailCoaMainAccType"."AccTypeID" left join "dbo"."CoaControl" "CoaDetailCoaMainCoaControl" on "CoaDetailCoaMain"."CoaControlID" = "CoaDetailCoaMainCoaControl"."CoaControlID" left join "dbo"."CoaSub" "CoaDetailCoaSub" on "CoaDetail"."CoaSubID" = "CoaDetailCoaSub"."CoaSubID" left join "dbo"."AccBalTypes" "CoaDetailCoaSubAccBalType" on "CoaDetailCoaSub"."AccBalTypeID" = "CoaDetailCoaSubAccBalType"."AccBalTypeID" left join "dbo"."AccDests" "CoaDetailCoaSubAccDest" on "CoaDetailCoaSub"."AccDestID" = "CoaDetailCoaSubAccDest"."AccDestID" left join "dbo"."AccFunds" "CoaDetailCoaSubAccFund" on "CoaDetailCoaSub"."AccFundID" = "CoaDetailCoaSubAccFund"."AccFundID" left join "dbo"."AccTypes" "CoaDetailCoaSubAccType" on "CoaDetailCoaSub"."AccTypeID" = "CoaDetailCoaSubAccType"."AccTypeID" left join "dbo"."CoaControl" "CoaDetailCoaSubCoaControl" on "CoaDetailCoaSub"."CoaControlID" = "CoaDetailCoaSubCoaControl"."CoaControlID" left join "dbo"."CoaMain" "CoaDetailCoaSubCoaMain" on "CoaDetailCoaSub"."CoaMainID" = "CoaDetailCoaSubCoaMain"."CoaMainID"

action.data:
declare @moneyreceiptRef nvarchar(50)
exec UPS_MRInsertUpdateAcc_Sales @MRDate ,@PayCatID ,@ModeofReceiptID ,@Checkno ,@ReceAmount ,@CheckDate ,@CheckPostDate ,@CheckBankName,@BankBranch,@Remarks, @AccFundID, @CoaDetailID, @AccSubNameID, @moneyreceiptRef output if (@moneyreceiptRef is not null ) begin set @Result_ShowAlert = @moneyreceiptRef +' is saved' set @Result_NavigateUrl ='MoneyReceipts.aspx'
end
